entry.title: Hawaiian Breeze
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: House of Fruit Blends
Price: 4.99 - 45.99 (24 variants)

Enjoy a refreshing taste of the tropics. We combined the juiciest pineapples while handpicking the coconuts for a beautiful tropical flavor that will fast forward you to the Caribbean!

VG Ratios:

  • 0, 3 and 6mg - 70% VG
  • 12 and 18mg - 65% VG
  • All salt variants - 50% VG

Note: All our salts are made from benzoic acid free nicotine salts!

entry.title: Tropical Paradise
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: House of Fruit Blends
Price: 13.99 - 45.99 (19 variants)

Tropical Paradise is a combination of sweet mangos and lychee that will fast forward you to the crisp and sandy beaches of Cancun. Enjoy everyday with a tank filled of the tropics!

  • 12 and 18mg - 65% VG

entry.title: Soft Fuzz
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: House of Fruit Blends
Price: 13.99 - 45.99 (19 variants)

Soft Fuzz is a unique blend of peach, pineapple, and watermelon that will satisfy your fruity palate. The special combination of pineapple and peach has a distinct taste with the watermelon to balance it all out for the perfect all day vape. 

VG Ratios:

  • 0, 3 and 6mg - 70% VG
  • 12 and 18mg - 65% VG

Type: House of Fruit Blends
Price: 4.99 - 45.99 (19 variants)
